org.qbroker.cluster

Class PacketProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.cluster.PacketProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PacketProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    PacketProxy is a proxy forwarding UDP packets to existing destinations. As a utility, it can ack like an observer for a cluster.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

      • start

        public void start()
        It starts the cluster node and supervises its state. With the communication XQueue defined, the cluster node will escalate or relay events to/from external caller via the XQueue. The cluster node will keep running until its shutdown.
